text: Jim Goodman is a former American football coach, scout, and executive. He was served the first head football coach at Valdosta State University in Valdosta, Georgia, serving from 1982 to 1984, compiling a record of 15–16. Goodman was the interim general manager of the Denver Broncos of the National Football League (NFL) in 2008. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Air Force Falcons football coaches Category:Arkansas Razorbacks football coaches Category:Denver Broncos executives Category:Denver Broncos scouts Category:National Football League general managers Category:North Alabama Lions football coaches Category:Rice Owls football coaches Category:Valdosta State Blazers football coaches Category:High school football coaches in Florida Category:Junior college football coaches in the United States Category:University of Florida alumni
title: Jim Goodman (American football)
